message.init_details: Your device will be configured by the setup wizard
message.init_welcome: Welcome! Your device was configured. To view or change your configuration go to Settings > Configuration
message.no_profile_config: Your profile will be created without a name. You can change this later in Settings > Configuration > Profile

device.reset: You are about to reset this device, which will erase all data including keys, profiles, and personal files

profile.name_update: Updating your username will result in public links on your profile being updated
